mapper.select: SELECT USERID AS userId, TITLE AS title, QUESTION AS question, ANSWER AS answer, CRTDATE AS crtDate, FAQNO AS faqNo, FAQIMG AS faqImg FROM FAQS ORDER BY FAQNO DESC
SELECT USERID AS userId, TITLE AS title, QUESTION AS question, ANSWER AS answer, CRTDATE AS crtDate, FAQNO AS faqNo, FAQIMG AS faqImg FROM FAQS WHERE FAQNO = #{faqNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQS (USERID, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CRTDATE, FAQNO, FAQIMG) VALUES ( #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question, jdbcType=CLOB}, NVL(#{answer, jdbcType=CLOB}, '답변 대기 중'), SYSDATE, #{faqNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faqImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
